record.name: Send Notification when New Problem is opened

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.New Problem to Problem Managers
rule.condition: same(isKnownError in $L.file, NULL) or isKnownError in $L.file=false
rule.conditionDesc: ( isKnownError in CurrentRecord = NULL OR isKnownError in CurrentRecord = false)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Known Error">isKnownError</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Known Error">isKnownError</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">false</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.New Problem to Problem Managers (when ( isKnownError in CurrentRecord = NULL OR isKnownError in CurrentRecord = false))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.New Problem to Problem Coordinators
rule.condition: same(isKnownError in $L.file, NULL) or isKnownError in $L.file=false
rule.conditionDesc: ( isKnownError in CurrentRecord = NULL OR isKnownError in CurrentRecord = false)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Known Error">isKnownError</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Known Error">isKnownError</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">false</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.New Problem to Problem Coordinators (when ( isKnownError in CurrentRecord = NULL OR isKnownError in CurrentRecord = false))
